contest-event.event-date:
May 1, 1994 D Yorkshire & Humberside BBA Contest (Second Section)
Yorkshire & Humberside BBA Contest (Second Section) 20 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest Yorkshire & Humberside BBA Contest yorkshire-humberside-bba-contest-second-section
Riley Smith Hall, Tadcaster, North Yorkshire, England, UK March contest - 1st Cottingham, 2nd Harrogate, 3rd Wetherby. Hymn tune contest - 1st Stannington, 2nd Cottingham, 3rd Harrogate. 36th annual contest. 6 bands competed.
Dec. 13, 2011, 2:01 p.m. Aug. 27, 2014, 12:55 p.m.
1 Cottingham Band Richard Grantham
2 Stannington Band Philip Bingham
3 Harrogate Band Peter Wells Sinfonietta for Brass Band [Langford]
4 Crofton Silver Band Brian Nicholson
5 Wetherby and District Silver Anthony Hall
6 Maltby Miners Welfare Band Terry Clifford
Withdrawn Rothwell Temperance Band Glyn Kearsley
Withdrawn Knottingley Silver Band Steve Platten
